model.storage

Interface IStorageDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ItemDAO, ProductDAO, ProductGroupDAO, SerializationDAOFactory, SQLDAOFactory, StorageUnitDAO

    public interface IStorageDAO
    The interface for all data access objects. Provides an easy way to work with the storage of models.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result delete(IModel model)
      Deletes a model from storage.
      IModel get(int id)
      Takes an id of a model, searches the storage for the presence of the model, and returns the found object.
      Result insert(IModel model)
      Inserts a new model into storage.
      Result update(IModel model) 

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        Result insert(IModel model)
        Inserts a new model into storage.
        Parameters:
        model - An instance of a model.
        Returns:
        a result indicating the success of the insertion.

      • update

        Result update(IModel model)
        Parameters:
        model - An instance of a model subclass with the same id as the model to be updated in storage.
        Returns:
        a result indicating the success of the update.

      • delete

        Result delete(IModel model)
        Deletes a model from storage.
        Parameters:
        model - An instance of a model subclass with the same id as the model to be deleted from storage.
        Returns:
        a result indicating the success of the deletion.

      • get

        IModel get(int id)
        Takes an id of a model, searches the storage for the presence of the model, and returns the found object. If no object was found, returns null.
        Parameters:
        id - of the model to get.
        Returns:
        an copy of the model.
